characters.story: The thread and locket bend down drooping - the latitude, a parallel line!
"GAN!" the bamboo sings cheerfully - a pole, a rod and shaft!
The paper punch and clothesline bend down drooping - rarely, seldom and uncommon!
"SHWEN!" the car sings cheerfully - a veranda, a pavilion from the untamed!
"GAN!" the flesh and offend sing cheerfully - the liver organ for a transplant!
"KAN!" the clothesline and saber sing cheerfully - a publication, a periodical magazine!
"HAN?" the water questions curiously after the offend - is this sweat, perspiration on the hair?
The tree stands for shaft, whispering "Gǎn!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"HAN!" the state of mind commands sharply during drought - bold, fierce and brave!
"SHOO?" the queue questions curiously - moving slowly, gradual and leisurely?
"SHOO!" the scale and taskmaster command sharply - recount, narrate and explain about qinghe!
"TOO?" the soil questions curiously - to smear, apply and spread?
"SHYEH?" the scale and big dipper question curiously - slanting, tilted and diagonal?
The mouth, bundle and saber bend down drooping - a flared horn, a trumpet speaker!
"SOH!" the mouth, bundle and yawn command sharply - to hack, cough and wheeze!
"LAI!" the shells command sharply - to rely on, depend and blame!
The strokes unite to show lazy, whispering "Lǎn!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"NUN!" the woman, bundle and taskmaster command sharply - tender, soft young dew grass!
"LYEN!" the fire commands sharply - to refine, smelt and purify!
"LYEN!" the metal commands sharply - a chain, a link for training!
A striking symbol for swollen that whispers "Zhǒng!" softly!
The flowers and heavy bend down drooping - the director, supervisor and manager!
